bibl.title: Saïs and its Trading Relations with the Eastern Mediterranean.
bibl.note: Recent work by the joint University of Durham - Egypt Exploration Society mission. Introduction. - Excavation work at Saïs. - Discussion of comparative assemblages. - The trading context. - Networks within Egypt. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Moving Across Borders. Foreign Relations, Religion and Cultural Interactions in the Ancient Mediterranean

bibl.seg: WILSON Penelope and Gregory GILBERT, Saïs and its Trading Relations with the Eastern Mediterranean.

Panagiotis KOUSOULIS and Konstantinos MAGLIVERAS (Edd.), Moving Across Borders. Foreign Relations, Religion and Cultural Interactions in the Ancient Mediterranean = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 159 (Leuven - Paris - Dudley, Mass., 2007) pp. 251-265, figg. 22-25, 2 tabl.

Recent work by the joint University of Durham - Egypt Exploration Society mission. Introduction. - Excavation work at Saïs. - Discussion of comparative assemblages. - The trading context. - Networks within Egypt. - Conclusions.
